verses.text: How perfect is thy word, Thy judgments all are just; And ever in thy promise, Lord, May man securely trust.
I hear thy word in love, In faith thy word receive; Oh, grant me grace from above, To teach me, Lord, thy way.
Thy testimonies, Lord, are true, Thy precepts all are pure; And long as Heaven and earth remain, The truth shall still endure.
Oh! may my soul with joy Trust in thy faithful word; Be it through life my chief employ, To keep thy precepts, Lord.
